summary: The module provides a set of adapters that convert generic DGL datasets into specialized formats for graph‑level, link‑level, and node‑level prediction tasks. Each adapter handles indexing, length queries, automatic creation and caching of train/validation/test splits, and exposes relevant metadata such as number of tasks, classes, and feature dimensions. It also includes utilities for generating negative samples needed in link prediction.
business_intent: Enable developers to quickly repurpose existing graph datasets for different machine‑learning objectives without manual preprocessing, thereby accelerating the development and evaluation of graph neural network models.
